articles.title: Cost of U.S.-supplied equipment for Canada’s new warships triples to $3.6B
articles.description: The increase to $3.6 billion is mainly for what is called non-major defence equipment and includes a U.S. navigation system and U.S. command systems.

articles.title: Who really benefits from proposed RRIF changes? Wealthy couples and the financial industry
articles.description: The push for further reform comes largely from those with the most to gain

articles.title: True economic sovereignty means using the free market for what it does
articles.description: In a world that increasingly emphasizes might over right, Canada can and should be far more ambitious when it comes to choosing its own economic destiny

articles.description: Rebound provides reprieve on recession chatter, but shouldn’t distract from need for strong policy response

articles.title: Uganda stops granting refugee status for Eritreans, Somalis and Ethiopians
articles.description: Government once seen as progressive on migration says aid cuts to blame for excluding countries ‘not experiencing war’The Ugandan government has stopped granting asylum and refugee status to people from Eritrea, Somalia and Ethiopia, citing severe funding shortfalls for the significant policy shift.

articles.title: Hornet-eating frog shows remarkable venom resistance
articles.description: Experiments reveal that pond frogs can eat highly venomous hornets without suffering noticeable damage, even after repeated stings. Most frogs successfully consumed hornets, including the notorious Asian giant hornet. This unusual resilience suggests that frogs may have evolved mechanisms to block t

articles.title: Meta starts kicking Australian children off Instagram and Facebook
articles.description: The tech giant will begin closing accounts for under 16s, a week before an official ban.

articles.title: Hidden Game: Caufield scores in shootout to beat Jets
articles.description: Montreal 3, Winnipeg 2 (SO). Andrei Markov gets a long ovation, that you didn't see if you watched on Sportsnet.

articles.title: Average family will spend nearly $1,000 more on food in 2026: report
articles.description: This will be hard to digest for Canadians already struggling to make ends meet: Your food bills will be going up in 2026. articles.title: Caufield scores shootout winner, Canadiens beat Jets 3-2 to snap two-game skid
articles.description: Cole Caufield scored the shootout winner after a frantic overtime period as the Montreal Canadiens defeated the Winnipeg Jets 3-2 in a back-and-forth game on Wednesday. Juraj Slafkovsky and Oliver Kapanen had goals in regulation as Montreal (14-9-3) snapped a two-game skid, including a 5-2

articles.title: Kitchener Rangers edge London 4-3 as Knights break their own OHL Teddy Bear Toss record
articles.description: A new OHL Teddy Bear Toss record was set as the London Knights collected 20,567 stuffed toys for the Salvation Army.

articles.title: ‘Pretty surreal’: Music by Indigenous Edmonton composer featured in final ‘Stranger Things’ season
articles.description: Audiences don’t get much bigger than a global phenomenon Netflix series.
